ThingDef.Name: Strain_CombatKnife_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Combat Knife
ThingDef.description: Perfectly balanced and can cause severe hemorrhaging. It weighs almost nothing.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Strain_Machete_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Machete "VTX"
ThingDef.description: A Savage classic, forged from 100 years of conflict. Now enhanced with vibro-technology.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Strain_StunBaton_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Stun Baton
ThingDef.description: Struck victims spasm helplessly, which tends to only provoke further beating by attacker.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Strain_P2Compact_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona P2 Compact
ThingDef.description: High-caliber sidearm deployed since the first contact with the Strain. Modified for CQC. Features an extended magazine and a laser pointer for reflexive firing.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Strain_SAP_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona SAP-1
ThingDef.description: The SAP-1 gained notoriety by punks in the Urbworld and Megacolonies for its high rate of fire and knockback.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Strain_SAPC_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona SAP "Convoy"
ThingDef.description: Adored by vehicle crews who hate to reload, this ultracompact version has twice the ammo.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Strain_SAPSOPMOD_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona SAP-SOPMOD
ThingDef.description: This sleek special-ops conversion increases the SAP's accuracy and damage output.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Strain_ShotgunChucky_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Shotgun "Chucky"
ThingDef.description: A shotgun used by the first-encounter killteams during the Neptune Incident.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Strain_ShotgunStumpy_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Shotgun "Stumpy"
ThingDef.description: A shortened version mainly used as a sidearm. Its spread is ideal for close encounters.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Strain_ShotgunOutranger_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Shotgun "Outranger"
ThingDef.description: An extended variant that is often deployed against hardened targets with AP-slugs.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Strain_LCR_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona LCR
ThingDef.description: The LCR is essenstially a cut-down MAR. Trading range, firepower and handling for portability.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Strain_LCRBandit_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona LCR "Bandit"
ThingDef.description: The LCR Bandit variant sports a large drum mag and a micro-laser module.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Strain_LCRE_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona LCR-E
ThingDef.description: The extended range L4 has a long reinforced barrel mod, angled foregrip and magnified optics.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Strain_MAR_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona MAR
ThingDef.description: The reliable, mass-produced Main Assault Rifle has been in service since the First Outbreak.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Strain_MARC_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona MAR-C "Pyrate"
ThingDef.description: This folded-up setup has a drum mag and reinforced barrel for prolonged firing. Yarrr!\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Strain_MARDMR_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona MAR4 DMR
ThingDef.description: The Designated Marksman variant trades portability for greater range.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Strain_HeavyBattleRifle_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Heavy Battle Rifle
ThingDef.description: A long-ranged, hard-hitting, semi-automatic cousin of the MAR4 with high velocity ammo.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Strain_HMGSAW_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona HMG60-SAW
ThingDef.description: The oppressive Squad Assault Weapon brings a wicked grin to those that wield it "Wolfen" style.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Strain_HAMRMonsterKiller_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona 20mm "Monster Killer"
ThingDef.description: This beast fires a 20mm shell that can tear through flesh and materiel. Handle with care.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Strain_Minigun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Tactical Minigun "Gatty"
ThingDef.description: The "Gatty" is a converted air-assault rotary cannon with a terrifying rate of fire.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Strain_RPG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona RPG Launcher
ThingDef.description: A versatile High-explosive Incendiary Armor Piercing RPG launcher. A multiple use alternative to single-shot launchers.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Strain_P2X_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona P2X
ThingDef.description: An experimental pistol, firing pulse charged munitions that gets charged as it leaves the barrel. A favorite among WhiteCell operators.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Strain_ShotgunOutrangerX_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Shotgun "Blaster"
ThingDef.description: An experimental shotgun, firing pulse charged munitions that gets charged as it leaves the barrel. Another favorite among WhiteCell operators due to their preference for close combat.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Strain_XMAR_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona XMAR
ThingDef.description: An experimental MAR, firing pulse charged munitions that gets charged as it leaves the barrel. Barely different from its mass-produced counterpart, owing to the fact that its one of the first weapons modified when the Mechanoids were also getting infested by the Strain.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Strain_XHMGSAW_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona XHMG60-SAW
ThingDef.description: An experimental Machinegun, firing pulse charged munitions that gets charged as it leaves the barrel. A heavy weapon capable of putting down armored variants of the Strain with ease, its effective whether the target is mechanical or fleshy in nature.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Strain_XHAMR_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona 12mm "Hunter Killer"
ThingDef.description: An experimental anti-materiel rifle, firing pulse charged munitions that gets charged as it leaves the barrel. Modified to fire 12x72mm charged munitions, this beast can tear a hole through anything it hits.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.
